meanings.definition: A type of bacteria that can cause food poisoning.
meanings.sent1: Salmonella can make you sick if you eat contaminated food.
meanings.sent2: The doctor diagnosed the illness as salmonella poisoning.
meanings.sent3: When the salmonella bacteria invited themselves to the picnic, nobody had a good time.
meanings.sent4: The spread of rumors in the office was like a salmonella outbreak, causing chaos.
meanings.sent5: Remember to wash your hands thoroughly to prevent salmonella contamination.

meanings.definition: An infection caused by the Salmonella bacteria.
meanings.sent1: She had to stay home due to a severe case of salmonella.
meanings.sent2: The outbreak was traced back to salmonella contamination in the water supply.
meanings.sent3: The salmonella infection turned the family reunion into a disaster.
meanings.sent4: His lies spread through the community like a salmonella epidemic.
meanings.sent5: The consequences of neglecting food safety can lead to salmonella infections.
